description: Local pseudo-tools for meta-operations within the Copilot API

local.get_file_info.name: get_file_info
local.get_file_info.description: Get detailed metadata about a file that was saved from a large MCP tool result. This returns information about the file including its data type, size, field names, record count, and sample data. Use this FIRST when you receive a file reference to understand what data is available, then use the appropriate internal_server file tools to query, search, or extract data from the file.

fileId.description: The unique file identifier from the file reference
